xbrlcore.instance
Class InstanceFactory

java.lang.Object
  xbrlcore.instance.InstanceFactory

public class InstanceFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for creating an Instance object of an instance file.

Author:
Daniel Hamm
